successes.title: The CRABBY Wallet: A wallet that is not for everyone...
successes.description: A minimalist wallet that holds everything you need and nothing more.

Pledges.description:
INNOVATORS:
Get the Crabby Wallet of your color choice. Choose between red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, grey, or black. Shipping included within the USA. Please add $5 shipping for backers outside the USA.

EARLY ADOPTERS:
Get the Crabby Wallet of your color choice. Choose between red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, grey, or black. Shipping included within the USA. Please add $5 shipping for backers outside the USA.

EARLY MAJORITY:
Get the Crabby Wallet of your color choice. Choose between red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, pink, grey, or black. Shipping included within the USA. Please add $5 shipping for backers outside the USA.
